程序包 com.pi.pano

类 MediaPlayerSurfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • com.pi.pano.MediaPlayerSurfaceView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback
    public class MediaPlayerSurfaceView
extends android.view.SurfaceView
    SurfaceView for playing photos and videos.

                                                     boolean isStitched,
                                                     @Nullable

        play image file.
        参数:
        file - file
        isStitched - stitch state
        listener - listener
        返回:
        null: can't play

      • setPreviewMode

        public void setPreviewMode​(int mode,
                           float rotateDegree,
                           boolean playAnimation,
                           float fov,
                           float cameraDistance)
        Set preview mode.
        参数:
        mode - PiPreviewMode
        rotateDegree - 0~360 Initial rotation angle, horizontal rotation in plane mode, and rotation around Y axis in spherical mode.
        playAnimation - Whether to play the switching animation when switching the display mode.
        fov - 0~180 Initial longitudinal fov.
        cameraDistance - 0~400 Distance from camera to ball center.
